channel.title: Darkest Time on Raja Sardar
channel.description: Recent content in Darkest Time on Raja Sardar

item.title: College Was My Way Out from My Darkest Time
item.description: In my drop year in class 12, despite being one of the strongest believers in myself, I almost started thinking that all my dreams were going to die. Maybe this was my destiny. Perhaps my chemistry teacher was right about me, and maybe I would not be able to achieve anything in my life. All my dreams started fading. But engineering college was my way out from my darkest time, and it was like a dream come true.
